about_the_game:
Explore, Build, Overcome, Survive - Together!


A story of two robots who are in search of a new gasoline source to settle down. Since the Great Collapse, civilization and the world fell into chaos. Now every robot roams in search of their own solutions. Some have fled, some dig in search of new resources, and others have become ruins. Now you need to find a new gasoline source.

Set out on a journey to find a new gasoline source. Along the way, you'll also need to scavenge enough fuel to keep yourself alive.

Road Journey: Navigate & Survive

Find your way through swamps, snowfields, sandstorms, ruins, and cliffs. Use your limited map and compass. And never run out of your fuel. Every drop counts. Both you and your vehicle rely on it to survive. Use whatever leftovers you can find to keep moving forward.

Be Creative: Build From Junks

Customize your vehicle with salvaged parts to overcome tough terrain, puzzles, and challenges. Use plungers to stick, fire extinguishers to boost and more with unique functions.

A Road Journey

In this anarchic world, you'll encounter the ruins of old companies, unique communities, bandits, wandering caravans, abandoned towns, and more. Trade, help or get robbed as you navigate this dangerous landscape.

Together Better

The best road trips are made with friends! You can play local co-op or Steam Remote Play to play with your friends!
If you prefer to go it alone, single-player mode is always an option!

name: No Gasoline

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10,Win 11+
  • Additional Notes: * This game is on early development. These requirements may change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10, Win 11+
  • Additional Notes: * This game is on early development. These requirements may change.

short_description: A road journey game. Build your vehicle with junks. Drive and navigate through an Open-World wasteland. Find new parts with unique functions. Overcome swamps, storms and more. Always keep enough fuel to keep yourself alive and your vehicle.
